title: Zoe disabled?
body: Woke up to a temp disabled zoe but no reason as to why this is. Any clarification Rito?

replies.body: She finally dropped in price and I picked her up, saw she was disabled with no information on the client or the site {{item:3073}}
It's been over 5 hours now with no update at all on this issue, still no client information at all. What the hell is going on?

Here I was logging on to get to 100k mastery today and the only champion I enjoy playing is disabled, with absolutely no information. 
Thanks Riot I appreciate it.
Yeah, kinda sucks. Been looking forward to her dropping to 6300 so I could finally buy her and give her a try. Hopefully it will be fixed what ever the problem is soon.
Real shame, as I'm one Zoe game away from completing the mission but I'm going away for two weeks.
I legit woke up today hyped to play some Zoe and to my disappointment she was disabled with no reason whatsoever. RITO PLS {{sticker:cass-cry}}
